original_text: In those days saw I in Judah some treading wine presses on the sabbath, and bringing in sheaves, and lading asses; as also wine, grapes, and figs, and all manner of burdens, which they brought into Jerusalem on the sabbath day: and I testified against them in the day wherein they sold victuals.
korean_text: 그 때에 내가 본즉 유다에서 어떤 사람이 안식일에 술틀을 밟고 곡식단을 나귀에 실어 운반하며 포도주와 포도와 무화과와 여러 가지 짐을 지고 안식일에 예루살렘에 들어와서 음식물을 팔기로 그 날에 내가 경계하였고

sentences.original_text: In those days saw I in Judah
some treading wine presses on the sabbath
sentences.korean_translation: 어떤 이들이 안식일에 술틀을 밟고 있었으며

sentences.original_text: as also wine, grapes, and figs
which they brought into Jerusalem on the sabbath day
in the day wherein they sold victuals
